{{Description|Crossing sand and searing wind, traversing thicket and forest, you reach a ruined city that was once part of a kingdom of gilded desert.<br>Though the mirage has faded, the ancient dreams and secrets yet slumber under the shifting sands.|Searing Dreams in the Sea of Sand}}
{{Location Intro|The '''Great Red Sand''', also known as '''Deshret Desert''',<ref><!-- for 3.1 areas -->{{Ref/Item|Hued Vase: Seashell}}</ref><ref><!-- for Desert of Hadramaveth -->{{Ref/Quest|Wisdom Has Built Her House, She Has Hewn Out Her Seven Pillars|quote='''Katheryne:''' The Tanit are the tribe from which Jeht hails. Their campsite is in the depths of Deshret Desert, amidst the ruins of what was once the city of Gurabad. If you don't mind, I'll mark it out on your map.}}</ref>|description={{If Self|Great Red Sand|It|Great Red Sand}} is one of the two desert subregions for this nation.}}

{{Quote|The vast desert in the western part of Sumeru is known as the Great Red Sand. In this world of sand, ancient ruins and mysterious treasures await you...|[https://www.hoyolab.com/article/8999372 Sumeru Adventure Journal: Trail of the Sea of Sand]}}
